claim: salient regions are distinctive with respect to both their local and global surroundings
text: The underlying idea is that salient regions are distinctive with respect to both their local and global surroundings .

claim_evidence: our saliency can successfully mark the regions that should be kept untouched
evidence: The first is retargeting [ 1 , 19 , 16 ] , where we show that our saliency can successfully mark the regions that should be kept untouched .
